General.Name: Multipolar Technology Tbk
General.Description: PT Multipolar Technology Tbk provides IT services and solutions in Indonesia. The company offers IT strategy and planning services, such as IT Program Management Office (PMO) set up and operation assistance, IT PMO set-up consulting service, IT PMO outsourcing, and project manager outsourcing services; customer experience platform and services, including e-channel, mobility, communication system and collaboration, business process outsourcing; and branch IT services; and digital insights solutions comprising big data and analytics, business performance intelligence, and artificial intelligence. It also provides banking, enterprise resource planning, smart office, enterprise project management, and field operations managed solutions; merchant IT services, IT operation and application managed services, IT service management, and healthcare solutions; and blockchain, Internet of Things, OS and virtualization, database platform, services oriented architecture, container management, application development platform, and application program interface management solutions. In addition, the company offers ICT infrastructure, co-location, data center managed, and cloud services, as well as disaster recovery as a service; and security solutions, and managed security service provider/security operation center. It serves financial, education, government, health care, manufacturing, oil and gas, and retail sectors. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Multipolar Technology Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Multipolar Tbk.
General.Address: Sopo Del Office Tower & Lifestyle TowerB, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12950
